name: The Goblin's Lair
description: A short adventure to test your mettle.

rooms.name: Cave Entrance
rooms.description: Daylight filters into a narrow cave mouth. The smell of damp earth fills your nostrils.

rooms.name: The Locked Chamber
rooms.description: A heavy iron door blocks the way forward. Strange symbols are carved into the stone walls.

rooms.name: The False Path
rooms.description: The passage twists unexpectedly. Loose stones crumble underfoot and the air grows stale.

rooms.name: The Goblin Throne Room
rooms.description: A crude throne of bones sits atop a raised platform. Tattered banners hang from the walls.

rooms.name: The Treasure Vault
rooms.description: Gold coins are scattered across the floor. A gleaming chalice sits on a stone pedestal.

items.name: rusty key
items.description: An old iron key, its teeth worn by time.

items.name: torch
items.description: A flickering wooden torch that casts dancing shadows.

items.name: broken sword
items.description: A snapped blade with a worn leather grip. Not much use in a fight.

items.name: gold chalice
items.description: A gleaming chalice encrusted with rubies.

items.name: goblin idol
items.description: A crude stone idol depicting a snarling goblin face.
